Package io.micrometer.tracing

Interface SpanCustomizer

All Known Subinterfaces:
Span
public interface SpanCustomizer
Allows to customize the current span in scope.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
OpenZipkin Brave Authors, Marcin Grzejszczak
